Type Method# setTurn(forSeat:context:)

visionOS 2.0+

```
static func setTurn(
    forSeat seat: some TableSeat,
    context: UInt64 = 0
) -> Self
```

Available when `Self` is `SetTurnAction`.## [See Also](/documentation/TabletopKit/TabletopAction/setTurn(forSeat:context:)#see-also)
